name: Pingme
body:
## What is pingme?
pingme is a 360 degree rotating camera using raspberry pi 3.

### Authors and Contributors
In 2016, Patrick Shim (@festinalente91), Youngchan je (@ochanje210), yangwoo (@lyw0149) and dabin (@heartjigi) founded Pingsters.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](dev.pingme@gmail.com) and weâ€™ll help you.
